text: Kohl's is an American department store retail chain, operated by Kohl's Corporation. It has 1,158 locations that makes it the largest department store chain in the United States . The company was founded by a Polish immigrant Maxwell Kohl, who opened a corner grocery store in Milwaukee, Wisconsin in 1927. The company is headquartered in the Milwaukee suburb of Menomonee Falls, Wisconsin, operating stores in every U.S. state except Hawaii. == References == == Other websites == * Kohl's official website * Kohl's corporate website Category:1960s establishments in Wisconsin Category:1962 establishments in the United States Category:Companies listed on the New York Stock Exchange Category:American department stores Category:Milwaukee Category:Companies based in Wisconsin
title: Kohl's
